sentences.en: A German firm launched a takeover bid for the company.
sentences.cn: 一家德国公司试图收购这家公司.

sentences.en: a takeover bid for the company
China's takeover of Hong Kong was a historic event.
sentences.cn: 中国收回香港是一件具有历史意义的大事。

sentences.en: Family control would prevent any hostile takeover or greenmail attempt.
sentences.cn: 家族管理可以防止任何恶意收购或绿票讹诈的企图。

sentences.en: Firm diversification is increasingly achieved by the means of takeover and merger.
sentences.cn: 通过接管和兼并,厂商经营范围日益多样化.

sentences.en: Hanson made an agreed takeover bid of £351 million.
sentences.cn: 汉森按协商出价3.51亿英镑接管该公司。

sentences.en: He prevented a hostile takeover (= when the takeover is not wanted by the company being bought ) of the company.
sentences.cn: 他阻止了对公司的恶意收购。

sentences.en: In order to make the offer more attractive takeover premium may increase.
sentences.cn: 为了使要约更具吸引力,收购溢价可能增加.

sentences.en: Kalon Group has sweetened its takeover offer for Manders.
sentences.cn: 卡龙集团已经向曼德斯公司开出更为优厚的收购条件。

sentences.en: The company have abandoned their takeover bid.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已经放弃了收购建议.

sentences.en: The company saw off the threat of a takeover.
sentences.cn: 公司经受住了被收购的威胁.

sentences.en: The company spent much effort in avoiding takeover bids from predatory competitors.
sentences.cn: 公司投入大量精力来防止来自非善意性竞争者的收购投标.

sentences.en: The likely takeover of Merrill Lynch is another one.
sentences.cn: 对美林的可能收购则是另一回事.

sentences.en: The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.
sentences.cn: 发言人拒绝向新闻界透露公司收购的详细情况。

sentences.en: The takeover attempt is turned down by the board.
sentences.cn: 兼并企图被董事会拒绝.

sentences.en: The takeover provoked a tempest of criticism.
sentences.cn: 这次收购引发了潮水般的批评。

sentences.en: Thornbury has announced a takeover bid of a regional TV company.
sentences.cn: 索恩伯里已经宣布将出价收购一家地方电视公司。

phrases.tran_cn: 收购行动；收购竞争；购并出价

trans.tran_cn: （事业等的）接管，（经营权等的）接收，验收，收购
trans.tran_en: when one company takes control of another by buying more than half its  shares
